BadgeDetail.Name: Customer Service
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge a proven record of delivering exceptional customer service. They have received at least one written personal thank you or a named mentioned on a card or online."There are no traffic jams along the extra mile." - Roger Staubach

Task.Title: Thank you
Task.Body: Upload evidence of any named mention from a customer. This could be from a thank you card, named mention on a website (e.g. Trip Advisor) etc.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence of any named mention from a customer. This could be from a thank you card, named mention on a website (e.g. Trip Advisor) etc.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence of any named mention from a customer. This could be from a thank you card, named mention on a website (e.g. Trip Advisor) etc.

Task.Title: The extra mile
Task.Body: Describe a situation where you have gone above and beyond expectations to deliver exceptional customer service.
Task.HtmlBody: Describe a situation where you have gone above and beyond expectations to deliver exceptional customer service.
Task.TextileBody: Describe a situation where you have gone above and beyond expectations to deliver exceptional customer service.
